summary: A deep space rescue and recovery spaceship with a crew of 6 receives a distress call from a mining operation 3432 light years away. A rescue operation via dimension jump is made. Bad idea.
cast: James Spader|Angela Bassett|Robert Forster|Lou Diamond Phillips|Peter Facinelli|Robin Tunney|Wilson Cruz|Eddy Rice Jr.|Knox White|Kerrigan Mahan|Vanessa Marshall|Kevin Sizemore
title: Supernova (El fin del universo)
